Landing.title: Your Personal Code Brain.
Landing.subtitle: A high-performance knowledge base for your code snippets and documentation. Built for developers who value speed and aesthetics.
Landing.smartSnippetsDesc: Store your code with syntax highlighting for 10+ languages. Now with complexity ratings and version history.
Landing.searchDesc: Find anything in milliseconds. Our backend-driven search indexes your titles, descriptions, and code content.
Landing.docsDesc: Write full articles and architectural guides in Markdown. Keep your knowledge organized alongside your code.
Landing.versioningDesc: Never lose a previous iteration. Kadoc automatically saves history when you update your snippets.
Landing.stackDesc: Built on a robust tech stack. Go handles the logic with extreme speed, while Prisma manages your data integrity.
Landing.fastDesc: No bloat. Pure performance. Designed to get you to your code or answer as fast as possible.

SnippetsList.emptyDesc: Your knowledge base is waiting. Create your first snippet to get started.
SnippetsList.noMatchesDesc: We couldn't find any snippets matching "{query}".

About.title: About Kadoc
About.description: Kadoc is a snippet manager built for speed.

DocsList.title: Documentation
DocsList.subtitle: Guides, architectural decisions, and references.
DocsList.emptyDesc: Start writing your first guide or documentation.
